#Text=Tonglu
#Text=Tonglu is a city in Zhejiang .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Tonglu is a country seat situated on the upper Fuchun River , which is the head water of Qiantang River that flows into Hangzhou .
#Text=Tonglu has more than 400,000 inhabitants .
#Text=By plane
#Text=The main international hub for the region is Shanghai Pudong Airport .
#Text=Hangzhou Airport is closer ; it has flights to most major Chinese cities and some international flights .
#Text=By train
#Text=The closest train connection is in Hangzhou , where you can catch a fast bullet train to Hongqiao station in Shanghai or south toward Ningbo and Fujian .
#Text=By bus or car
#Text=From Hangzhou you can take a bus or drive a private vehicle along motorways G2501/G25 or G320 .
#Text=Get off at the Tonglu exit .
#Text=See
#Text=Tonglu is where you can escape the polluted cities of the north , take a stroll through nature , and experience cultural heritage , such as opera , embroidery and ceramics .
#Text=Some notable natural destinations include Baiyunyuan , Babisong , Yaolinxianjing , Langshijintang and Yangshanfan .
#Text=Fenshui is the largest suburb of Tonglu .
#Text=Fenshui is about 30 km from Tonglu downtown .
#Text=Also , down along the Fuchun River .
#Text=Daqishan National Forest Park would the first option for visitors interested in nature .
#Text=Mount Daqi is near downtown Tonglu and is accessible via public bus and taxi , or on foot .
#Text=Daqishan has crystal clear streams and pools , diverse vegetation , gigantic but lifelike rocks , uncountable types of birds and tiny insects , and fresh air .
#Text=Local villages include Yanshanfan Village and Hengcun Village , which have special festivals at certain times of the year .
#Text=Hengcun has a festival every March 8th of the Lunar calendar .
#Text=Yangshanfan Village will have a Follower Festival that is always held in the spring when Peach Blossoms bloom across the countryside .
#Text=During the festival you can stroll through the mountains and enjoy performances put on by locals .
#Text=Do
#Text=You can get rest in Tonglu .
#Text=Take your time
#Text=enjoy your holiday in nature .
#Text=If you visit Tonglu in spring and all the flowers come out , you will fall in love with this city .
#Text=If you like doing sports , Tonglu is also a good place for you .
#Text=The Tonglu Sports Centre is fully equipped .
#Text=Buy
#Text=You can buy fresh produce from local farmers at green grocers around the city .
#Text=Traditional gifts for such as embroideries and ceramics are also plentiful .
#Text=General goods can be bought large supermarkets around the city .
#Text=Eat
#Text=There is delicious food in Tonglu .
#Text=In different part of Tonglu , there are different tastes .
#Text=But most of them are 辣的 .
#Text=You can find many interesting foods in small 弄堂 .
#Text=There are barbecues and Quji duck heads and Yongkang meat pie .
#Text=Drink
#Text=You can go to ( 子曰的甜品屋 ) and the dessert is really good !
#Text=Sleep
#Text=There are many hotels in Tonglu , like Lijun , Xinkaiyuan , Luoma , and Honglou .
#Text=New Century Grand Hotel Tonglu , Baiyunyuan Road 999 near Yinchun Road .
#Text=In the city 's central business district , within walking distance of many shopping and dining options .
#Text=Large screen LCD TVs , in-room safes and mini fridges .
#Text=From ¥ 298 . ¥ 30 per person
#Text=breakfast. .
#Text=Go next
#Text=Tonglu-> Fuyang
#Text=30 minutes drive
#Text=Tonglu-> Qiandao Lake
#Text=1 hour drive
